body_html: I see this as an opportunity to start a collective effort for finding a subset of what research is cooking in different burners and what it is "ready" for eating at inference and that impact near metal production (open or closed source). I think that a multi stakeholder effort for finding an agreement to update the standard one or two times at year could be feasible. /cc @fchollet
